title: white screen
body:
The app is only displaying a white screen after loggin in.  I came here to try this app because the PWA on chrome is doing the same thing.


**To Reproduce**
1. log into app
![teams](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/efa23b99-8991-483d-ad02-cfed8db5bef2)


**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Linux mint 22
 - Installation package: deb
 - Version latest

Not sure what to post from the debug.
